description: Google APIs Authentication Client Library for Node.js
name: google-auth-library

scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover -x 'apis/**' _mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --timeout 4000 && cat coverage/lcov.info | coveralls
scripts.generate-docs: typedoc --name 'Google Node.js OAuth 2.0 Client' --out docs --readme README.md ts/lib
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run check-format && npm run coverage
